subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets gave Jon Niese a 10-run cushion, but he was unable to get out of the fifth inning, leaving with a six-run edge and the bases loaded in a victory over visiting Detroit.
snippet: The Mets gave Jon Niese a 10-run cushion, but he was unable to get out of the fifth inning, leaving with a six-run edge and the bases loaded in a victory over visiting Detroit.
